section.name: Compiling the OpenTool
section.p: Here are quick steps to compile the OpenTool :

ol.li: Prerequisite : this assumes you have JBuilder installed if you want to test installation of the tool

In your build.properties set the following property :
maven.opentool.jbuilder.home
to point to your JBuilder home dir (under Mac OS X it will be something like /Developer/Applications/JBuilderX/JBuilderX.framework)

Compile & install the maven plugin :
maven plugin:install

If you want to deploy to JBuilder to test :
maven opentool:install

To undeploy from JBuilder, simply type :
maven opentool:uninstall
